channel.title: I am sick of this! Please read this!
channel.description:
This is what I get when I first log in:
[11:11:54] Starting MoparScape 3.2 [11:11:54] Playing 0-hangar.mid [11:11:57] [11:11:57] News: Welcome to MoparScape 3.2, the pinnacle of RS2 [11:11:57] News: first generation client editing, with a built [11:11:57] News: in private server, music player capable of playing [11:11:57] News: both midis and mp3s, item/object/npc changer/viewer and [11:11:57] News: much much more. For updates, suggestions, or help [11:11:57] News: please visit the forums at www.moparisthebest.com/smf [11:11:57] News: and post in my thread. Y'all have fun. [11:11:57] News: [11:11:57] News: For online servers, look at the [11:11:57] News: server status list at moparisthebest.com [11:11:57] News: [11:11:57] News: -moparisthebest [11:11:57] Server : 127.0.0.1
Then I type the user and pass, and it said it regesters. "Accepeted form server ya da yada, regestration sucessfull with the user ya da and pass bla bla.
All seems right, right? Well, right, it is all fine...but then like litterely 1 minute into my game play, I get this:
Server: Client lost connection: timeout Game saved for player *Username* Server: ClientHandler: Client *Username* disconnected.
Why does it do this, and what can I do to fix it?
Thanks
<Trainmaster>
^^B®ÏÑG ÚŠ^^ WÕ®L|) þËÅ©€!

hey… if you are doing it from the site… you need to download it… because the system is have technical faults…if you download it, it would be much faster… believe me

item.title: I am sick of this! Please read this!
item.dc:creator: @Trainmaster Trainmaster
item.description:
@Trainmaster wrote:

So how do I turn off this “timer”?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 14, 2007, 11:12:10 PM[/size][hr]You there?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 14, 2007, 11:14:57 PM[/size][hr]Grrr…nm, I’ll check back in the morning, even though I doubt I’ll have a reply, no one ever answers my posts.

^^B®ÏÑG ÚŠ^^
WÕ®L|) þËÅ©€!

Read full topic

item.title: I am sick of this! Please read this!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Well, most likely the server your on is under a “timer”, some people have a twisted notion that restarting every 5 minutes or so makes their server have less lag. So, probably that.

Read full topic
